data.chText: 在…的中间；在中途；到一半
data.enText: at an equal distance between two points; in the middle of a period of time

data.chText: 它大约位于伦敦和布里斯托尔的中间。
data.enText: It's about halfway between London and Bristol.

data.chText: 他在仪式进行到一半时离开了。
data.enText: He left halfway through the ceremony.

data.chText: 恐怕我们连一半的路都还没走完。
data.enText: I'm afraid we're not even halfway there yet.
part of the way towards doing or achieving sth

data.chText: 这只是部分地解释了实际发生的事。
data.enText: This only goes halfway to explaining what really happened.

data.chText: 任何一张还算像样的地图都能提供那些信息。
data.enText: Any halfway decent map will give you that information.

data.chText: 和某人妥协；对某人作出让步
data.enText: to reach an agreement with sb by giving them part of what they want

data.chText: 和某人妥协；对某人作出让步
data.enText: to reach an agreement with sb by giving them part of what they want

tr: including only half or a portion
at a point midway between two extremes

example: he was halfway down the ladder when he fell

value.def: Halfway means in the middle of a place or between two points, at an equal distance from each of them.

example.ex: Half-way across the car-park, he noticed she was walking with her eyes closed...
example.tran: 走到停车场中间时，他看到她在闭着眼走路。

example.ex: He was halfway up the ladder...
She was halfway down when she heard the noise.
example.tran: 她向下走到一半时，听到了响声。

gramarinfo.label: usu ADV prep/adv, also ADV after v

value.def: Halfway means in the middle of a period of time or of an event.

example.ex: By then, it was October and we were more than halfway through our tour.
example.tran: 那时已是10月，我们已经完成了行程的一大半了。

example.ex: Welsh international Matthew Postle was third fastest at the halfway point.
example.tran: 到半程时，威尔士的世界级选手马修·波斯特尔位居第三。

value.tran: （时间）到一半;（事情）进行到中途

value.def: If you meet someone halfway, you accept some of the points they are making so that you can come to an agreement with them.

example.ex: The Democrats are willing to meet the president halfway.
example.tran: 民主党人愿意向总统作部分让步。

example.ex: You need hard currency to get anything halfway decent...
example.tran: 你得有硬通货才能买到还算不错的东西。

example.ex: All I had to do was be halfway cool.
example.tran: 我要做的只是保持适度的冷静。

trans: 半途而废；不能半途而废；半途而廢
(两种迥然不同事物特征的)折中，妥协；重返社会训练所，中途之家(为出狱者及离院病人而设)
